name: Pixel Productions Inc.
description:
Pixel, A Result Driven Website Design Company:
We are a full service Website Design and development company; however, we offer much more than simply a website to our clients. In fact, our clients choose us because of our unique ability to blend creative graphic design and dynamic website functionality with effective website marketing strategies. Because of our unique ability to seamlessly integrate these services, we achieve amazing results for our clients.
 
We know you have a lot of choices when it comes to partnering with a web development company, so what makes us different?
Good question... first of all we are a well established company; not so small that you need to worry about where we’ll be in a year or two and not so large that you’ll be passed off to an account rep, eventually leading to frustration due to neglect and broken communication channels. When you have questions - we’re here to answer. Secondly, there are no surprises with us. We make sure you have a good understanding of the design process, development schedule and costs involved to desired completion. If you have any questions, just call us for clarification 541.773.3351.
